content.rendered:
CPC Medical Coder | Tulsa, OK The CPC Medical Coder Position is Full-time, Monday – Friday, 8:00am – 5:00pm. CPC Medical Coder Experience Requirements:
  • 2+ years’ experience as a medical coder/biller
  • Experience with patient encounters
  • Experience with auditing charts and generating reports required
  • Experience with Medicare, Medicaid, Tricare and Commercial payers
CPC Medical Coder Requirements:
  • Medical Coding: 2 years
  • CPC required
CPC Medical Coder Responsibilities: Will be responsible for billing and A/R follow of claims
